Parameter.description: Filter search Result,we must select filter by paging.
Filter search Result by size of the current page.
Sort search Result by DESCending or ASCending("asc" or "desc") default by asc.
Sort search Result by field (it can be price ,purchaseNumber and browseNumber) default by purchaseNumber.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "respCode":"100",
    "respMsg":"Successful",
    "data":{
         "totalCount": 22,
         "totalPage": 3,
         "currentCount": 2,
         "currentPage": 3,
         "books": [
         {
             "bookId": "1",
             "bookName": "MySql必知必会",
             "price": "30.00",

             "inventory": "50"，
             "intro": "MySql数据库基础入门必备"，
             "image": "",

             "purchaseNumber":"50"，
             "creatime":"2019年4月12日"
         },

             "bookId": "2",
             "bookName": "Java程序员面试笔试宝典",
